meanings.sent1: She enjoys marbelizing her artwork to give it a unique look.
meanings.sent2: The artist is marbelizing a plain vase to make it more elegant.
meanings.sent3: The children had fun marbelizing their toy blocks with colorful paint.
meanings.sent4: Her skilled hands marbelize the paper effortlessly, creating beautiful patterns.
meanings.sent5: Watching her marbelize the cake with icing was mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: The process of creating a marble-like pattern or effect.
meanings.sent1: The marbelizing of the countertop gave it a luxurious appearance.
meanings.sent2: The marbelizing on the walls added a touch of sophistication to the room.
meanings.sent3: The marbelizing on the floor made it look like a grand palace.
meanings.sent4: The marbelizing technique used on the fabric made it look expensive.
meanings.sent5: The marbelizing in the artwork made it stand out from the rest.

meanings.definition: The act of adding marbling to a surface.
meanings.sent1: Her marbelizing of the book cover made it look more appealing.
meanings.sent2: The marbelizing on the table transformed it into a work of art.
meanings.sent3: The marbelizing on the ceiling made it seem like a sky full of clouds.
meanings.sent4: The marbelizing on the car hood gave it a unique and stylish finish.
meanings.sent5: The marbelizing on the walls created a sense of depth in the room.
